name: MLCRMSPropOptimizer
desc: An optimizer that represents the root mean square propagation algorithm.

items.name: init(descriptor: MLCOptimizerDescriptor)
items.desc: Creates an RMSProp optimizer with the descriptor you specify.

items.name: init(descriptor: MLCOptimizerDescriptor, momentumScale: Float, alpha: Float, epsilon: Float, isCentered: Bool)
items.desc: Creates an RMSProp optimizer with the descriptor, momentum scale, smoothing, epsilon, and option to compute the centered RMSProp that you specify.

items.name: var momentumScale: Float
items.desc: A hyper-parameter that specifies the momentum factor.

items.name: var epsilon: Float
items.desc: The epsilon value you use to improve numerical stability.

items.name: var isCentered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether you compute the centered RMSProp.
